member.name: T:sliver.Windows.Forms.StateBrowser
member.summary: A Windows Forms control that displays an object graph in a tree.

member.name: T:sliver.Windows.Forms.IStateBrowser
member.summary: Provides functionality required by state browsers.

member.name: P:sliver.Windows.Forms.IStateBrowser.BoldMemberNames
member.summary: An array of member names to bold in the tree.
member.remarks: Any members with names contained in the array will be bold.

member.name: P:sliver.Windows.Forms.IStateBrowser.BoldMemberTypes
member.summary: An ArrayList of Types to bold in the tree.
member.remarks: Any member types that are contained in the arraylist will be bold.

member.name: P:sliver.Windows.Forms.IStateBrowser.ObjectToBrowse
member.summary: The object to browse.

member.name: P:sliver.Windows.Forms.IStateBrowser.ShowDataTypes
member.summary: Determines if the data type will be shown in the tree. Default is true.

member.name: P:sliver.Windows.Forms.IStateBrowser.ShowNonPublicMembers
member.summary: Determines if private members will be shown in the tree. Default is false.

member.name: P:sliver.Windows.Forms.IStateBrowser.ShowStaticMembers
member.summary: Determines if static members will be shown in the tree. Default is false.

member.name: T:sliver.Windows.Forms.TypeCollection
member.summary: Collection of Types.

member.name: M:sliver.Windows.Forms.TypeCollection.Add(System.Type)
member.summary: Adds a Type.
member.returns: Index of the newly added Type.

member.name: M:sliver.Windows.Forms.TypeCollection.AddRange(System.Type[])
member.summary: Adds one or more types to the collection.

member.summary: Removes a Type from the collection.

member.name: M:sliver.Windows.Forms.TypeCollection.IndexOf(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a Type in the collecton.
member.param: The Type to locate in the collection. The value can be a null reference.

member.name: M:sliver.Windows.Forms.TypeCollection.Contains(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether an element is in the collection.
member.param: The Type to locate in the collection. The value can be a null reference.
member.returns: True if item is found in the collection; otherwise, false.
